text: Limadora is a genus of land snails with an operculum, terrestrial gastropod mollusks in the family Pomatiidae."Mollusca" . Diversidad Biológica Cubana, accessed 23 March 2011. == Species == Species within the genus Limadora include: * Limadora garciana (Aguayo, 1932) * Limadora scabrata (Torre & Bartsch, 1941) * Limadora tollini (Ramsden, 1915) == References == Category:Pomatiidae
title: Limadora
